TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewCellStyleScopes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the entity that owns the cell style that was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs> to indicate which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> owns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes AlternatingRows = int32(128)

Docs.summary: One or more values of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes Cell = int32(1)

Docs.summary: One or more values of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes Column = int32(2)

Docs.summary: One or more values of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes ColumnHeaders = int32(16)

Docs.summary: One or more values of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes DataGridView = int32(8)

Docs.summary: One or more values of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property changed.
